# The `EHContGuardCatchret` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> pass to insert a symbol before each valid catchret target and store these in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a>&#39;s CatchRetTargets vector.

This usually implemented in terms of the name that is registered by one of the Registration templates, but can be overloaded directly.
